titleStmt.title: The nature & effects of the new-found well at Kinghorne: declared by William Barclay, Master of Artes and Doctour of Physicke, and written in a letter to my lord the Earle of Dumfermeling, and Chancellar of Scotland
titleStmt.author: Barclay, William, 1570?-1630?

notesStmt.note: Title page on A3v. A1 is blank except for signature within frame; A2 contains, with caption title "To mine approoued friende Andro Hart.".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
